CutSceneText.Text: (All the catapults appear to have been rendered harmless.)
Bhrfixalyegliuwgef!!!!!
Wadanka!!!
Kalwbxslkefahiwe!!!!
That was dangerous. You should be grateful that I arrived in time to rescue you.
Thank you very much.
My family's archery skills are second to none.
Yes, you are uniquely skilled in battle. But who are you...?
Oh, I forgot to introduce myself. I'm Keidian, the Knight's Staff Officer.
Yurid sent me to protect you. I'm late because I was held up on the way here.
If I'd arrived any later, Yurid would have been mad at me.
Keidian... I've heard that name somewhere before...
Really? Haha! I'm pretty famous here in Tijerid. I'm flattered.
No, that's not it...
Eh?
Quite by chance, somebody gave me a letter and it had your name on it.
Yes? Hand it over quick...
How... How can this be?
Have you shown this to anyone else?
No, not a soul. But...
I've gotta get back. Forget that you ever saw this letter, and that you showed it to me.
I'm telling you this in your own best interest. Well...
